titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the two-year waiting period for divorced spouse's benefits following the divorce.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/28/2009--Introduced.
Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the two-year waiting period following a divorce for a divorced spouse to become entitled to a spouse's OASDI benefits.
